description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This app uses the date/time set on your Xbox to show you the exact days/ h/min/sec left to New Year! When only 9 sec left the countdown will turn red and start beeping, wanting you to join in. When the countdown reaches 0 there will be colorful fireworks and atmospheric sound effects. There’s also a Simulate New Year button for the once who’d like to celebrate New Year at another time! Enjoy!
description.short: This app uses the date/time set on your Xbox to show you the exact days/ h/min/sec left to New Year! When only 9 sec left the countdown will turn red and start beeping, wanting you to join in. When the countdown reaches 0 there will be colorful fireworks and atmospheric sound effects. There’s also a Simulate New Year button for the once who’d like to celebrate New Year at another time! Enjoy!
